column5: Went to New Brunswick for 2 weeks and we had NO rain while there and it was hot as hell so not a lot of brookie fishin' done. Creeks were low and the spots I did hit were crap except for the first one. Went to go out on the boat with the brother-in-law. Got the boat in the water but motor didn't start. So that day was shot. The flounder trip fell through. I was not impressed. Did get out for some perch and chain pickeral. Only got out a couple times but hammered the pickeral both times. Not really big ones but bigger than I usually get when I'm down. Tried some new lures and spinners I got from BPS and they worked great. Here's a few pics.
Looks like you hade a good time Steve.Did you even visit your family or just fish for two weeks.
Nice report and pics!!!  I really like those Lobs!!!
Cool! The gold colour on those Chain Pickerel is really something to see. I was at Woodstock there years back & got some Smallmouth Bass too. Nice country & folk down there.
great report and pics, chain pickerel ....dont get those up here, very similar to pike?
Nice brookies. Its cool to see those chain pickerel. And those lobsters look Yummy! Too bad about the flounder fishing...And who goes to New Brunswick without taking any scenery shots???
Very nice load of pics thanks for sharing.I have seen a few of those chain Pickeral in my lifetime and can appreciate the vivid colours on them.  Great report
Great job SR  Nice brookies!  Thanks for sharing Leechman
I take it those  claw dudes are for me    TFS
